name: parabolic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a type of curve like that made by an object that is thrown up in the air and falls to the ground in a different place: a parabolic curve/trajectory A parabolic dish mounted on the roof receives the Internet signal from a satellite. See
parabola
More examplesFewer examplesThe plane made a parabolic dive back to 24,000 feet.Looking back, we can see the long parabolic curve of the town and the ocean.The six rows of parabolic mirrors track the sun.
